channel.title: CVE Feed for TP-Link -- TL-WA855RE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TP-Link -- TL-WA855RE

item.title: CVE-2020-10916|2024-08-04T11:14:15.896Z -- tp-link -- tl-wa855re
item.description: This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of TP-Link TL-WA855RE Firmware Ver: 855rev4-up-ver1-0-1-P1[20191213-rel60361] Wi-Fi extenders. Although authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability, the existing authentication mechanism can be bypassed. The specific flaw exists within the first-time setup process. The issue results from the lack of proper validation on first-time setup requests. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to reset the password for the Admin account and execute code in the context of the device. Was ZDI-CAN-10003.
